cronExpressionsFormat: The cron schedule expression must match the required format

variables.descriptionTooLong: Description must be less than 500 characters

fileName.leadingTrailingSpaces: Name cannot have leading or trailing spaces
fileName.cannotStartWithDot: Name cannot start with a dot

directoryName.cannotStartWithDot: Directory name cannot start with a dot
directoryName.leadingTrailingSpaces: Directory name cannot have leading or trailing spaces
